title: Breithorn (Grengiols)
text: The Breithorn is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> of the Swiss <a href="Lepontine%20Alps">Lepontine Alps</a> in the <a href="Valais">Valais</a>. It is part of the municipality <a href="Grengiols">Grengiols</a> and overlooks the lower <a href="Goms%20%28district%29">Goms</a> on the north side and the <a href="Saflischtal">Saflischtal</a> on the south side, east of the <a href="B%C3%A4ttlihorn">Bättlihorn</a>.
